Unlock Your Inner Speedster: To combat jealousy, focus on developing your own unique workflow and productivity system. Experiment with different tools and techniques until you find what works best for you. This could include setting specific goals for each task, breaking larger projects into smaller chunks, or using time-tracking apps to monitor your progress. By optimizing your productivity, you'll be able to complete tasks efficiently and effectively, and your jealousy will fade away.

Adopt a Growth Mindset: Rather than comparing yourself to others, focus on your own growth and development. Embrace challenges as opportunities to learn and improve, and celebrate your small victories along the way. By shifting your mindset, you'll be able to see your own progress and accomplishments, and the jealousy will dissipate.

Practice Gratitude: Take a moment each day to reflect on the things you're grateful for. This could include your health, relationships, or even the simple pleasures in life. By focusing on what you have, rather than what others have, you'll cultivate a sense of contentment and appreciation that will help you overcome jealousy.

Find Your Own Path: Don't try to emulate others or follow in their footsteps. Instead, find your own unique path and focus on your own goals and aspirations. By pursuing your own passions and interests, you'll be able to find fulfillment and happiness, and the jealousy will fade away.

Let Go of Comparison: Comparison is the root of all evil, as the old saying goes. Instead of comparing yourself to others, try to focus on your own strengths and abilities. Celebrate the successes of those around you, and recognize that everyone has their own unique journey and path to success. By letting go of comparison, you'll be able to cultivate a sense of peace and contentment that will help you overcome jealousy.
